headline: Rockwell Automation Extends Reach In Green Cooling And Industrial Cybersecurity
summary: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) and subsidiary CUBIC, via RLAY A/S, partnered with Danish OEM Fenagy A/S to support natural-refrigerant heating and cooling solutions. The company also opened a Security Operations Center in Singapore to serve industrial customers across the Asia Pacific region. Rockwell Automation, trading at $406.77, has seen a 36.9% return over the past year and a 77.9% return over the past five years. These new moves in sustainable refrigeration and cybersecurity sit...

headline: Rockwell Automation Declares Quarterly Dividend at $1.38 Per Share on Common Stock
summary: MILWAUKEE, February 11, 2026--The Board of Directors of Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), following its regular review, today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.38 per share on its outstanding common stock, payable March 10, 2026, to shareowners of record at the close of business on Feb. 23, 2026.

headline: E Tech Group and Rockwell Automation Announce Joint Live Session on Streamlining Modernization in Food & Beverage Manufacturing
summary: E Tech Group, a leading provider of industrial automation and systems integration, 2025 System Integrator of the Year and Rockwell Automation Platinum System Integrator, today announced a collaborative live session with Rockwell Automation focused on helping Food & Beverage manufacturers accelerate modernization with PlantPAx®, Rockwell Automation's distributed control platform.
